com.karangandhi.networking.utils

Class Message<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>,Q extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.karangandhi.networking.utils.Message<T,Q>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The Enum of which the id will be a instance of
    Q - The datatype of the body
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Message<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>,Q extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is the message class that will be written and read from the stream of the socket.
    See Also:
